upcomingEvents.title: Blood Heroes Mega Drive
upcomingEvents.description: Join our largest blood donation drive of the year at SM Manila. Help us collect 1,000 blood units to replenish hospital supplies across Metro Manila.

upcomingEvents.title: Basic First Aid & CPR Certification
upcomingEvents.description: Two-day comprehensive training on emergency first aid response and CPR techniques. Open to all volunteers and the general public. Certificate provided upon completion.

upcomingEvents.title: Run for Relief 2026
upcomingEvents.description: Annual charity run supporting our disaster response programs. Choose from 3K, 5K, or 10K categories. All proceeds go to typhoon relief operations.

upcomingEvents.title: Pakain at Pag-asa Feeding Program
upcomingEvents.description: Monthly feeding program for 500 children in Tondo, Manila. Volunteers needed for meal preparation, distribution, and activities with kids.

upcomingEvents.title: Disaster Preparedness Drill
upcomingEvents.description: Comprehensive earthquake and fire safety drill for volunteers. Learn evacuation procedures, search and rescue techniques, and emergency coordination protocols.

upcomingEvents.title: World Health Day Caravan
upcomingEvents.description: Mobile health screening and awareness campaign across 5 barangays. Free BP monitoring, blood sugar tests, and health consultations for the community.

pastEvents.title: Grand Volunteer Orientation 2026
pastEvents.description: Successfully onboarded 450 new volunteers across Metro Manila chapters. Thank you to all who joined our humanitarian mission!

pastEvents.title: Typhoon Sakura Relief Operations
pastEvents.description: Deployed 680 volunteers, distributed 45,000 relief packs, and provided emergency shelter to 15,847 families in Northern Luzon.

pastEvents.title: Volunteer Excellence Awards 2025
pastEvents.description: Recognized 156 outstanding volunteers for their exceptional service. Presented certificates and awards for achievements in humanitarian work.

campaigns.title: Typhoon Sakura Relief Operations
campaigns.shortDescription: Emergency response for 15,000 displaced families in Northern Luzon
campaigns.needs: We urgently need continued support for housing reconstruction materials, livelihood programs, and psychosocial services.

campaigns.title: Mobile Health Caravan 2026
campaigns.shortDescription: Bringing medical services to 50 remote barangays across Visayas
campaigns.needs: Help us reach our goal of 50 barangays by supporting mobile clinic operations, medical supplies, and volunteer doctor honoraria.

campaigns.title: Kabuhayan Plus Success Stories
campaigns.shortDescription: Empowering 500 families with sustainable livelihood training
campaigns.needs: Program complete! 100% funded. Thank you to all our donors and partners who made this transformation possible.
